jcr:root.jcr:title: donna.billups@pookmail.com POST on Gearing up for my Kili hike.

object.jcr:description: Josh, don’t underestimate the value of comfort food. When you reach day four and you’re cold and tired and maybe what they cook doesn’t exactly sit well with you, having that candy bar or snack or whatever you bring along with you can be the best thing that ever happened to you.

target.displayName: Gearing up for my Kili hike.
